description: Try our easy to follow Coconut & Raspberry Loaf recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Tea cake,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Sesame free,Mother's Day,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Cake,Peanut free
name: Coconut & Raspberry Loaf Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180Â°C. Grease and line a 6 cup-capacity loaf pan with baking paper. Combine coconut flour, desiccated coconut, bicarbonate of soda and lemon rind in a bowl. Whisk eggs, buttermilk, honey, butter and vanilla together. Add to dry ingredients and stir well to combine. Gently fold in the raspberries.
Spoon into prepared pan and smooth top. Bake for 50 minutes or until cooked when tested with a skewer.
Stand for 10 minutes before removing from pan and transferring to a wire rack to cool. Dust with icing sugar. Cut into 12 slices and serve.
